nodes.text: LH75 Low Orbit Specialty Live-Haul Frigate

The LH75 Low Orbit Specialty Live-Haul Frigate, also known as the LH75 Specialty Live-Haul Freighter or the L.O.S. Live-Haul, was a class of freighter manufactured by Rothana Heavy Engineering. The LH75 was used to transport live cargo by the Galactic Republic's Department of Agriculture and Nonsentient Creatures, but was also put into use to support the Grand Army of the Republic once the Clone Wars began. The freighters were used as landing craft for transportation of riding beasts by clone troopers, though was not designed to operate near the front lines of battle.
